flawed_nl_solution:
Thor sold 200/10=<<200/10=20>>20 stuffed animals.
Jake sold 20+10=<<20+10=33>>33 stuffed animals.
Quincy sold 200-33= <<200-33=167>>167 more stuffed animals than Jake.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30.0, not 33.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
